title.narrative: CHILD PROTECTION SERVICES

description.narrative: Key child protection actors are able to provide appropriate services for children at risk of, or those who have experienced violence, exploitation and abuse, which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Hiv â€“ General, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Protection of children and adolescents from violence, abuse and exploitation in emergency and non-emergency settings is enhanced
